website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive and unique color-changing candle from an established maker of outdoor products.
pros: The small lantern can be placed on a table or hung by its handle
Unique color-changing properties in a LED citronella candle
cons: The candle is small with a limited perimeter of effectiveness

customer_reviews.title: They are absolute crap. The led light works the very first time ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I've bought 3 of these candles. One from a home store and 2 from Amazon. They are absolute crap. The led light works the very first time you light it and after that, the light doesn't work at all. I would not recommend buying this product. It's terrible. If I could, I'd give it 0 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Kensie'sMama

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging. Cant even use what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 candles 1 came with a different product and was packaged in a box, double bubble wrapped and wrapped in brown paper wrap and was fine. The other three were just thrown in a BAG with a shirt, seriously. Glass packaged in a bag. Ofcourse they were broken and I had to throw them away. Also they were packaged with a t-shirt I ordered for a present which was covered in glass and little shards of citronella candle stuck to the shirt. I order alot of stuff off of amazon this is by far the worst thing that I have received. Not happy at all. The 1 surviving candle works good and looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Cutler Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good at first..
customer_reviews.text: I liked this candle at first, the color change was nice, then after one use, it didn't change color anymore. The first time I used it , it was lit for only about 45 minutes. It still lights and seems to help with Mosquitos, but disappointing that the color change stopped. I have since notified customer service, and they were great. I sent in the specs and pics of the candle and they sent me a new one, only took a few days to get it. Don't know how it will be but it's nice that they sent me a new one :)
customer_reviews.author: FXBR

customer_reviews.title: Packaging needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: This candle does an ok job of repelling mosquitoes, just like any other citronella candle. You will still have some come around, but it keeps most away. The scent does seem more pleasant than other citronella candles, and the color changing feature kept my kids entertained. I had to order this candle twice, however. The little nubs that keep the handle on were broken off, probably through shipping/delivery. I finally gave up after the second one came broken since it still worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: KMW

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and it was cracked down the side and one of the pegs for the metal hook to attach too was broken off. I looked in the box to see If it was there and thought perhaps I could glue it on, but it wasn't there. This candle is also double the price on here vs. What it sales for at Wal-Mart. I noticed it yesterday and that's no one's fault but my own for not doing my research, but just a heads up to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Willow Neer

customer_reviews.title: and when they do they’re pretty dim. The citronella scent is very weak and ...
customer_reviews.text: These never want to stay lit even with properly trimmed wicks and in still air. The lights almost never work, and when they do they’re pretty dim. The citronella scent is very weak and I found that these did not deter insects as well as the “off”and “cutter brands. Wouldn’t purchase again,
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great SELLER, great product
customer_reviews.text: Seller was great, hes a small business and inthese difficult times we have to help each other. I requested a return because the candle did not change colors, THE SELLER RESPONDED RIGHT AWAY, I was doing it wrong, the candel changes colors when lit, not when you press the button (duhhh, I did not read the instructions well). The product is beautiful and I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Broken candle, 4 day shipment not two!
customer_reviews.text: One candle made it fine, the other one was broken into many pieces. There was no padding between the two glass candles. Also this 2 day shipment took from the 17th to the 21st to get here. The rest of our order came before our camping trip, this porion did not. This all being said, the candles are awesome and make for great table deco while camping and playing games while keeping bugs away.
customer_reviews.author: Susandt10

customer_reviews.title: Used it once, obviously it got wet even though ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it once, obviously it got wet even though I put a cover on it and colors have never worked again so it works as a plain old candle. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Sagalow

customer_reviews.title: I've had good ones and bad ones.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several of these and some work fine while others stop changing colors after burning a little while. One of them had the LED sensor so high up in the wax that it melted within 20 minutes of us lighting the candle. One had a super short wick so it didn't burn long and then the whole jar was still filled with wax and no way to burn it. Frustrating because the first one we ordered was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this entertaining citrenella candle!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an add on for $3.88. We didn't start using it until lately and can't get over how great this candle is! Besides keeping nearby bugs away it is so impressive changing colors, nice to look at, not too big or too small. We've been using it for quite a few hours. I just looked to reorder but Amazon doesn't offer it anymore and their vendors are way too pricey. It'll be a sad evening when this fantastic candle fizzels out😱
customer_reviews.author: Cali-Jo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Candle seems fine. Nice scent and the color change led works as expected. 3 stars for Amazon packaging not packaged properly glass that hold handle broke off. Not enough time to get it replaced so will use broken. Bought for trip.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color changing candle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle. It is very nice to look at it, has a very plesant aroma and works well to keep some bugs away. I bought 2 for myself and gave some to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M

customer_reviews.title: They change color which is pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: ordered 4, some came broken (i live overseas) so it ruined the event a little bit, but i love these candles and how they let off different light. the wick could be a little thicker, especially for being used outdoors, but as long as there isnt a strong wind (or any wind) they work ideal
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We’re beautiful however one arrived completely broken because it wasn’t packed ...
customer_reviews.text: The Coleman color changing led. We’re beautiful however one arrived completely broken because it wasn’t packed carefully and the holder on all the lighted Coleman’s came broken I wasn’t impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Love the color change
customer_reviews.text: Love the color change only reason I gave them a 4 is that after it rains they don't work anymore. Just have to make sure to bring them in or turn them over if it's going to rain
customer_reviews.author: Sharlette

customer_reviews.title: Works great. First one arrived with a crack in the ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: It doesn't light up in different colors anymore...:( cute candle and the smell isn't over powering. Works great. First one arrived with a crack in the glass but they replaced with a new one immediately. Colors are fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kmel

customer_reviews.title: expensive
customer_reviews.text: The candle is much much smaller than I expected. Plus the multi coloured feature only lasted for one burn. I guess we didnt get bitten thought! Overall very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: sarah king

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately came broken
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful candle. My shipment came broken, was disappointed but they gave me a quick turn around. No issue with company or product.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: warm look got they put off in the evening is nice. I’ll be buying more.
customer_reviews.text: Sitting on the back deck listing to the spring peepers and watching the candles. No bugs because the citronella is working. Enjoying life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attracts Bugs?!?
customer_reviews.text: The candle seems to be fine but the awesome LED base just attracts Bugs like crazy. Cool but self defeating???
customer_reviews.author: delta boater

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these Coleman candles. I haven’t had any problem with the arrived product being broken, etc. The LED lights are beautiful & entertaining. I would recommend these candles 100% based in my personal success with multiple purchases
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Coleman candles
customer_reviews.text: first 2 candles lasted for a few nights - I purchased another 2 candles. Burned these Friday night for a few hours. Sorry I purchased them. I am disappointed the short period of time that these candle burn. When burning the candles look very night but do not have a good burning period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D'Ambrogi

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 3 broken
customer_reviews.text: I gabfest lot these up yet but they smell powerful so I will very they'll keep the mosquitoes away. Very disappointed that 1/3rd of them are broken. They were loose in the box, very poorly packaged. I do like their appearance. They are small and, the ones that arrant broken, will look good on a small Shepard's hook.
customer_reviews.author: LolasMom

customer_reviews.title: I've ordered a several this summer and LOVE them. They're not very big
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered a several this summer and LOVE them. They're not very big, and honestly I don't think they work very well when it comes to repelling bugs - but darn it, they look SO cool at night if you're outside camping or by a pool. I'll keep ordering them as long as they remain under $4... I would not pay full price (as much as I like them), so I'm stocking up when I can.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kensington

customer_reviews.title: Mystical magic Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: This is freakin Awesome! I don’t understand how it works but it changes colors to provide ambiance and repels mosquitos! I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Froggy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice color changing effect. Love them
customer_reviews.text: We love these candles. The color changing effect works great. No complaints at all. Would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenEagle

customer_reviews.title: So very cool..
customer_reviews.text: So very cool ... the colors are entertaining, and the scent is not obtrusive. If it’s keeping the buggers away, then I’m happy (I’ve not seen any yet)!
customer_reviews.author: Ginamina

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and calming
customer_reviews.text: Its so cute....as soon as you light it up the LED effect takes place. So pretty and calming! Its like grown up magic!!! Update: the color change effect doesn’t last. I’ve only burned it about 3-4 times for a total of 3 hours. It’s does send the bugs away. But that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this works but color changing is very cool
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Baughn

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing at first
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing at first, but after a couple burns and I’m not sure if it’s the wax or if it’s the wick but once one of those start to run out the color starts to fade. Until eventually it doesn’t light up at all and now I just have this huge candle that has no use to me because it’s not pretty at all :(
customer_reviews.author: Dont trip

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: As others stated, mine arrived broken. The glass part that holds the handle was broken right off. There was plenty of bubble wrap to protect it.. but it still didn't make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Koepke Family

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The wick only lasted an HR. Now it won't stay lit.
customer_reviews.author: DianaraSHERRY

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & fun how the change colors!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty & fun how they change colors. Good citronella smell not sure how well deters mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mandie

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Candle is very pretty when changes color, but blows out very easily. After use: color changing stops. It blows out super easy. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Acoustic_Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Cool color change
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool! Don't know how they do it, but once you light the wick they slowly change color. They actually smell really nice to.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for keeping biting bugs away. I put them on my tables on my deck. They burn for a very long time, I've used them for half of summer and I still have enough in them to use for spring.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. We used them for an evening event with ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. We used them for an evening event with an R&B singer and jazz band. The color changing enhanced the evening. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Decent product. Poor packaging/shipping.
customer_reviews.text: These candles are cool if you receive them in one piece. I bought four of these candles and had to exchange two of them because they were broken. They did exchange the two with no problem but when I received them one of the two replacement candles was again broken. Certainly an interesting product, they just need to be packaged more securely.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rawlins

customer_reviews.title: Colorful if they're not broken
customer_reviews.text: I like the product overall, but 2 of the 5 arrived broken into shards. Maybe useful for mosaic projects if I get desperate.
customer_reviews.author: ScandyGold

customer_reviews.title: I am looking forward to using this candle this summer ...
customer_reviews.text: I am looking forward to using this candle this summer. It is heavy and larger than I expected. I wish I had ordered more than one.
customer_reviews.author: kwarren

customer_reviews.title: No protective wrap for glass!
customer_reviews.text: No protection for glass Well I ordered four of the Coleman scented citronella candles and out of the four three were damaged. They packed them in a box with no protective bubble wrap whatsoever no protection at all. Two of them are Beyond using one of them just the handle has come off but the glass parts that hold it are broken off so I cannot hang it but I can set it on the table the fourth one came out okay. Very disappointed I have ordered these in the past and they were always wrapped completely in bubble wrap. These were supposed to be for a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Fakse advertising. Dont buy from this seller
customer_reviews.text: This was suppsed to be a 3 pack. I pad 15 dollars for a candle you can get at Walmart for 3. I am unhappy as it was advertised incorrectly
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoors, so pretty with color of glass changing.
customer_reviews.text: Nice for patio, great deal.. these are so great I can't believe it the colors, so pretty to even have a few of them outside hanging, med size.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome changing colors
customer_reviews.text: Awesome changing colors. Beautiful . Keeps bugs away. Some of arrive broke in packaging and returned for refund. The intact ones I kept.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment in Coleman quality for this item
customer_reviews.text: It's small which I knew, but unless you live in a climate without a breeze, even a sneeze, you have to constantly re-light it. The colors didn't change. probably because the wick kept going out. Would not re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.....
customer_reviews.text: These are a gimmick, don't waste your money. The light in the bottom does light up and change colors and it is pretty cool but becomes very faint after too few lighting's. The wick is short and runs out before the citronella does so you wind up throwing away about a third of the citronella. And these containers are very brittle glass which should never be used around a pool or spa. We are going back to the metal buckets and use immersible color changing LEDs along side them. Search on em!
customer_reviews.author: Rene McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like these candles but 2 arrived broken even with being wrapped. :(
customer_reviews.author: SSZaher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love watching the light changing so much, you forget about the bugs!
customer_reviews.author: Karl J. Gillard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful changing colors
customer_reviews.text: I used for the 1st time on the fourth of July. The colorful part is brighter than I expected...and seemed to help keep the bugs away. I think these are really nice quality candles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bummer, boo dislike!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to order these... But feel very disappointed.. 3 of the 4 I ordered would not stay lit, shipped out replacements , those too failed to stay lit. Finally just have up and pitched em, out of 8 candles in total... 1 was able to stay lit until it finally ran out.. Bummer! The color changing was pretty nice when it was burning.
customer_reviews.author: sarah bradford

customer_reviews.title: Liked it better just to use in the
customer_reviews.text: took camping and it was ok. Liked it better just to use in the yard
customer_reviews.author: GrammaCarol

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So cool!!! Pretty colors, and the candle is perfect for outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Jobe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: stopped working too fast at first gorgeous after three lightings it barely works
customer_reviews.author: Colleen D. ORourke

customer_reviews.title: Candle came with handle missing. Haven't had a chance ...
customer_reviews.text: Candle came with handle missing. Haven't had a chance to use it yet and it's winter now, so there aren't any bugs to repel.
customer_reviews.author: Vu N.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice relaxing and long lasting candle. Wish they were alittle bigger
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Bedenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Cool but didn't last long before it died
customer_reviews.text: Was great at first, but stopped burning half way down
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Good size. I like the handle for when I want to walk around outside.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Vick

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival glass was shattered. Per reviews this is a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not good value
customer_reviews.text: Very small and light burned out the 2nd time I used it. Not good product for price.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This really does change color and it even smells good.
customer_reviews.author: AMK

customer_reviews.title: kept mosquitos away
customer_reviews.text: worked but the led lights stopped glowing and changing after 2 uses
customer_reviews.author: Aerobat9

customer_reviews.title: I love to look at the colors change
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It cuts on when you light it. Shuts right off when the lit goes out. Very pretty to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Dejah McCrimmon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: Color change only lasted for 1 use, which is the only reason I bought it...
customer_reviews.author: Carie Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Beautiful colors that help light up the night and keep the bugs away!
customer_reviews.author: drew percival

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: Super cool. Huge hit while camping. It wasnt super buggy where we were but I think they helped!
customer_reviews.author: Pupster

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It was very effective against bugs. It changes beautiful colors very pretty at night I should have bought another one
customer_reviews.author: Caronda Moman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The top part of the jar was broken where the handle is attached
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty at first, but the color does go away after using a time or two...
customer_reviews.author: Kim22

customer_reviews.title: Not what it says it is.
customer_reviews.text: Does not change colors. Wick burns out too quick and gets put out often. Was nothing as I expected. I would not buy again. :/ Would have returned it if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Nissen

customer_reviews.title: Great while the color changing lasted.
customer_reviews.text: The color changing only lasted about three times when lit and now its just plain white and most of the candle is still left.
customer_reviews.author: dennis s.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: These candles are awesome. Love, love, love them!! I placed them around the pool and everyone commented on the unique ambiance. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and they last a long time. Light triggers the color changing LED in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave a 1 for the colors, very unhappy this candle didn't do one thing it was supposed to do

customer_reviews.title: The product is a NECESSARY AND THEY ARE ARRIVING BROKEN.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and my Family went throw a Huracan, so they NEED those supplies. THE PRODUCTS ARE ARRIVING DAMEGE, BROKEN.
customer_reviews.author: Christian R Torres.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color changing on this! Keeps the bugs away too!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter and she loves them. thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Broke pieces
customer_reviews.text: 2 handles were broke. Package wad not secure at all...

customer_reviews.title: Coleman Candle
customer_reviews.text: Awesome candle!!!! Keeps the bugs away and is super pretty! Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Only changed colors the first time I lit it then never again waste of money
customer_reviews.author: jessica kline

customer_reviews.title: Not the best smelling candles
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and were as advertised. Not the best smelling candles, but they were effective and the led color changing feature was pretty dope.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: I bought four of them and now am stuck with useless junk.
customer_reviews.text: These candles will NOT stay lit! I bought four of them and now am stuck with useless junk.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.

customer_reviews.title: So cool! It really does light up and change colors
customer_reviews.text: So cool! It really does light up and change colors....and yeah...keeps the mosquitoes away too! Loved it so much I ordered more.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the coolest things. I wonder how they work neat

customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for a couple of lights then stopped changing colors no idea why.

customer_reviews.title: Soo cool!! I'll be ordering more of these
customer_reviews.text: Soo cool!! I'll be ordering more of these! Works good and the color changing is mind blowing! Defiantly a must have. Wish i could use it indoors and id use it year round. I recommend highly!!

customer_reviews.title: ... don't know how it changes color but it works good.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how it changes color but it works good.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as the flame is close to the wick, the colors start changing. I burn mine AT LEAST 2 hours per night, and I it about 3 weeks ago. It looks barely used. It's a really cool candle to have outside!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: If two of the candles were not broken, they would get 5 stars.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool, I am giving them to my friends and they love them too!

customer_reviews.title: One of the handles had broken off during shipping but I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived broken but I'm still using it! One of the handles had broken off during shipping but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought two candles, but liked them so much I ordered six more!

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be larger like most citronella candles
customer_reviews.text: Make note of how small this thing is before buying! I thought it would be larger like most citronella candles, but it's really tiny!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Wright

customer_reviews.title: Candles were broken
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 Candles, both were broken, the glass was shattered in pieces and one of the handles was not even included

product_meta.title: Coleman Color Changing LED Citronella Outdoor Scented Candle
feature_bullets: Unique Citronella scented candle, Entire candle illuminates with color changing LED when lit
Shaped embossed glass with wire handle
LED has a battery life of 30+ hours.
